mapper.update: update member_view set password = #{password} where email = #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into mp_view values ( #{email}, #{mp_lic}, #{mp_co}, #{mp_co_num}, sysdate, null )
mapper.select: select count(*) from res where res_name = #{res_name}
select car_id from car_view where email = #{email}
